page.title: 20A DAY IN THE LIFE OF---
page.content: PAUL MASON BORN 22/3/1974 07.00 Get up,get dressed and watch Breakfast T.V. 07.50 Breakfast - Coco-Pops,toast and orange juice. 08.10 Wash dishes,clean shoes,wash myself then leave for school at 08.35. 09.00 School bell rings followed by Assembly which lasts for twenty minutes.After that we work until 12.00 with a short break at 10.30. 12.00 Lunch _ Fish,chips and peas,cornflake pie and custard. 13.15 Lunch-time ends.We work until 15.45 apart from a break at 14.30. 16.00 Arrive home and watch T.V._ "Batfink","He-Man","Dungeons and Dragons"."Blue Peter","Newsround". 18.00 Have tea - sandwiches and cake. 18.20 Go to Scouts until 21.00. 21.00 Watch T.V. until bedtime at 22.00.
